title: Highest proportion of time spent on unpaid domestic and care work by males
description: In 2016, Cuban males spent 12.47% of their day on unpaid domestic and care work, one of the highest proportions globally.

title: Highest number of physicians per 1,000 people
description: As of 2021, Cuba had 9.43 physicians per 1,000 people, making it one of the countries with the highest density of physicians.

title: Highest average transaction cost of sending remittances
description: In 2023, the average cost of sending remittances to Cuba was 19.63%, one of the highest in the world.

title: Complete birth registration in rural areas
description: In 2019, Cuba achieved 100% completeness in birth registration in rural areas, ensuring full coverage.

title: Lowest merchandise trade as a percentage of GDP
description: In 2020, merchandise trade accounted for only 8.32% of Cuba's GDP, one of the lowest percentages globally.
